BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.opengauss.visitor.statement.impl.OpenGaussDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitAlterTable(OpenGaussStatementParser$AlterTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.opengauss.visitor.statement.impl.OpenGaussDDLStatementSQLVisitor.visitCreateTable(OpenGaussStatementParser$CreateTableContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.opengauss.visitor.statement.impl.OpenGaussStatementSQLVisitor.findBinaryOperator(OpenGaussStatementParser$AExprContext) excessively uses methods of another class

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.opengauss.visitor.statement.impl.OpenGaussStatementSQLVisitor.createProjectionSegment(OpenGaussStatementParser$TargetElContext, OpenGaussStatementParser$AExprContext, ASTNode) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.opengauss.visitor.statement.impl.OpenGaussStatementSQLVisitor.visitGroupByItem(OpenGaussStatementParser$GroupByItemContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.opengauss.visitor.statement.impl.OpenGaussStatementSQLVisitor.visitSortby(OpenGaussStatementParser$SortbyContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
